title: Restricts certain access to records kept by the surrogate's court
summary: Restricts access to records kept by the surrogate's court for business or commercial purposes; makes certain exceptions; and requires any person seeking access to books or records of the court to complete a form which shall disclose such person's name, address, telephone number and purpose of such access.
actClause: AN ACT to amend the surrogate's court procedure act, in relation to restricting certain access to records kept by the court
